title: Roald & Beatrix: The Tail of the Curious Mouse
description: Follows the story of when a six-year-old Roald Dahl meets his idol Beatrix Potter.

title: Humanitarian: The Real Michael Jackson
description: So much has been written about Michael Jackson. The majority of it manufactured, twisted and just down-right untrue. Until NOW - In the year 2000, Michael Jackson was listed into the ...

title: Pretty Little Dead Girl
description: Emma, the lucky recipient of a recent heart transplant, sets out to find the identity of her donor only to learn that it was her estranged cousin and may have been the victim of murder.

title: Broken Mile
description: A drug addict awakens to find the girl he is with is dead, and must rush to escape the consequences. A real-time thriller presented in a single, unbroken take.

title: Boyfriend Killer
description: A grieving mother suspects her son's ex girlfriend may have been involved in his death.

title: Opening Night
description: A failed Broadway singer who now works as a production manager must save opening night on his new production by wrangling his eccentric cast and crew.

title: The Harry Hill Movie
description: The musical comedy features Harry Hill and his gran taking their sick hamster to the vet, while facing disturbance from Harry's evil twin and his friends. Along the way, Harry falls in love and meet various odd people...

title: Teen Beach Movie 2
description: Many people like Mckenzie. He has 3 friends, who always bring joy and surprise to him. In these three friends, Mckenzie is in love with a girl. But there are so many girls who pursue him, so betwween Mckenzie and this girl have misunderstanding. And then what will happen?
